column4: Hi. I'm using Ubuntu 10.04.3 LTS 64bit with Eclipse Indigo SR1. When I quit from Eclipse by File->Exit it really doesn't quits - I still can see it running (ps ax). Anyone occurred this problem?
I did report this bug to Eclipse bugzilla, but problem doesn't seem to be related to Eclipse itself. On 11.10 it works.
maybe the newer version solves the bug. Is there a ppa for it?
